name: Magferium
description:
This is a demo of a game I am making called Magferium. This demo is not what the full game might be, but it would represent the work we have done. It is made with paint.net, Rpgmaker MV. My friend has really helped on this with art, concepts and music. his socials: Bandlab, Deviantart.

Known issues:

Dungeon is unfinished

No battles (still working on)

Some Sprite issues

Controls:

arrow keys to walk

esc for character menu

enter to interact
